page.title: 05Businesses, Oldland Common
page.content: In this semi-rural area, industries are sparse. There are no large business premises. The majority of the block is farmland. Businesses employing most people are the Abattoir, Woodyard and Industrial Fasteners factory. Other businesses are: petrol station with vehicle repair facilities, two public houses, car body repairs and crash specialist, dog kennels, driving school, welding firm, builders merchants, several farms, coach painters, car engineers, building firm, stone mason, farm butcher, hairdressers, plant hire business, stables and a refuse dump. Some private houses sell a variety of items, e.g. hand-made wooden bird tables, potatoes, plants, manure and fresh foods. These could be called "Cottage Industries".
